question: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) approved the appointment of Committee of Directors (CoD) to run which bank?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) approved the appointment of Committee of Directors (CoD) to run Dhanlaxmi Bank.
RBI is said to have approved a three-member interim committee of directors, headed by G Subramonia Iyer, to run the bank. Earlier, the shareholders voted out the bankâ€™s MD and CEO Sunil Gurbaxani.
